last_episode_to_air.name: Legacy
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Black Mafia Family story comes to a dramatic close, as law enforcement makes their final play. Meech and Terry hope their legacy won’t be written with them behind bars while Lil' Meech is determined not to follow in the footsteps of his father.

name: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
original_name: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
overview: Docuseries about the Black Mafia Family, who built one of the largest American cocaine empires.

episodes.name: Detroit Dreams
episodes.overview: Set in early 1980s Detroit, the Flenory family is struggling to make ends meet prompting their sons Demetrius "Meech" and Terry to turn to drug dealing in an effort to help.

episodes.name: Gangster Boogie
episodes.overview: The rivalry between the Flenory brothers and Layton escalates, reaching a deadly new level. Meanwhile, the Detroit drug landscape is shifting due to gang wars, creating new opportunities.

episodes.name: The South's Got Something To Say
episodes.overview: Meech lands in Atlanta, determined to build a drug empire and new life. After securing a cartel connection and building a network of loyal hustlers, the "Black Mafia Family" is born.

episodes.name: The World Is BMF's
episodes.overview: Meech and Terry form BMF Entertainment, branching out into music, but as they reach their pinnacle of fame and fortune, law enforcement is getting suspicious.

episodes.name: Club Chaos
episodes.overview: A deadly shooting at Atlanta's hottest nightclub brings unwanted attention to Meech and BMF. Law enforcement zeros in on key evidence to the case they are building against BMF.

episodes.name: Time To Run
episodes.overview: The Flenory brother's rift deepens, and the crew's loyalties are divided. Law enforcement makes key discoveries that force Meech to make a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: Thunderstorms In The Forecast
episodes.overview: Meech can't escape his old habits as he tries to stay a free man and keep BMF alive. Little does he know that his remaining crew aren't as loyal as they seem. One by one, the dominos are falling.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: The Black Mafia Family story comes to a dramatic close, as law enforcement makes their final play. Meech and Terry hope their legacy won’t be written with them behind bars while Lil' Meech is determined not to follow in the footsteps of his father.
